entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Langley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 11:26 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the water this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 40%
